name: Blemmyes
description: The Blemmyes is a large monstrosity characterized by a strong build and a chaotic presence on the battlefield. It lacks a head, with its features on its torso, making it a disturbing sight.
memorable: Its Carnivorous Compulsion ability compels it to attack incapacitated foes, leading to brutal ambushes.
goals: It seeks to attack and incapacitate adversaries, especially those that are weakened.
relations: It may be encountered alongside other chaotic monstrosities or as a servant of brutal masters.
environment: Typically found in wild or untamed areas, where chaos and danger abound.
strengths: High hit points and impressive melee damage capabilities make it a significant threat.
weaknesses: Very low Intelligence, Wisdom, and Charisma can limit its tactical options.
attacks: The Blemmyes can deal significant damage with bite and slam attacks, along with a ranged rock attack that can cause fear.
most_powerful_ability: Carnivorous Compulsion, which forces it to attack incapacitated creatures, enhancing its ambush tactics.
skills: It has a skill in Intimidation, reflecting its intimidating presence.
additional_information: Capable of swallowing a creature whole if it is incapacitated and Medium or smaller.
Its slam attacks can stun targets, hindering their responses in combat.
When throwing rocks, it can frighten opponents, causing chaos in enemy ranks.
